disable.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make someone unable to use a part of their body properly
disable.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Carter was permanently disabled in the war.
disable.translation[0].definitions[0].no: Disable is usually passive in this meaning
disable.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to deliberately make a machine or piece of equipment impossible to use
disable.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The virus will disable your computer.
